info.title: BinckBank.OpenApi
info.description:
BinckBank OpenAPI is an API Platform to access BinckBank's trading services.

Curious? Request your access key after reading the documentation on Github: https://github.com/binckbank-api/client-js#binck-openapi-documentation

get.summary: Gets all the active accounts of the customer.
get.description: If there is no account, the collection will be empty.

200.description: [OK] A list of the accounts.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the specific account details.
get.description: Only active accounts are returned.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

200.description: [OK] The account is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the balance for a specific account
get.description: This call can be used to get the spending limit and total asset value.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

200.description: [OK] The balance is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets all instruments in a predefined list
get.description: List are a fast way to retrieve a group of instruments. Count in the response might be an 'educated guess'.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: id of the list

parameters.name: includeTickSizes
parameters.description: When set to true, the response will include a table with the Ticksizes for the instrument, default = false

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of 1 or more instruments.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets instrument information
get.description: Parameter 'SearchText' or 'Isin' is required. 'Type' is optional, 'Mic' can only be used together with 'Isin'.

parameters.name: includeTickSizes
parameters.description: When set to true, the response will include a table with the Ticksizes for the instrument, default = false

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: instrumentType
parameters.description: Additional optional filter on instrument type. Cannot be used alone.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Case insensitive search text, minimum length 2. Cannot be used in combination with 'Isin'.

parameters.name: isin
parameters.description: Selection on isincode. Cannot be used in combination with 'SearchText'.

parameters.name: mic
parameters.description: Additional optional selection on Market Identification Code, to be used only in combination with 'Isin'

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of 1 or more instruments.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets instrument information for leveraged products like Turbo's
get.description: Provide one or more filter criteria in the query parameters. When a filter value is not specified, the default value is used.

parameters.name: includeTickSizes
parameters.description: When set to true, the response will include a table with the Ticksizes for the instrument, default = false

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publishing company, default is 'binckBank'

parameters.name: longShort
parameters.description: Long or short, default is 'all' (both long and short)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category, default is 'indices'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies type (Turbo or XL), default is 'all' (both Turbo and XL)

parameters.name: stoplossMin
parameters.description: Specifies minimum stop loss

parameters.name: stoplossMax
parameters.description: Specifies maximum stop loss

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of 1 or more instruments.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets instrument information for the specific id
get.description: Multiple instruments can be retrieved if separated by comma, for example to get the instruments from the positions.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Ids of the equity to retrieve. If there are multiple ids, separate them by comma's.

parameters.name: includeTickSizes
parameters.description: When set to true, the response will include a table with the Ticksizes for the instrument, default = false

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

200.description: [OK] The instrument information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets KID document information for an instrument
get.description: Use this for instruments which have the isKidApplicable flag set to true. This endpoint searches for documentation. Still, it might be the case there is no documentation for a specific instrument, in the language of the customer. It can also be the case there are multiple documents for a certain instrument.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the instrument.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

200.description: [OK] The instrument information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

404.description: [NotFound] The instrument or KID document is not found.

get.summary: Get KID document
get.description: The document is a PDF file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the equity to retrieve.

parameters.name: kidId
parameters.description: Id of the Kid document.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

200.description: [OK] The instrument information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

404.description: [NotFound] The instrument or KID document is not found.

get.summary: Gets the series for a derivatives class (options/futures)
get.description: This endpoint can be used to get an option sheet.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description:
Selection on symbol. 
Cannot be used in combination with 'UnderlyingInstrumentId'.

parameters.name: underlyingInstrumentId
parameters.description:
Selection on the ID of the underlying equity.
Cannot be used in combination with 'symbol'.

parameters.name: marketIdentificationCode
parameters.description: Can be used in combination with symbol to specify the market.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Can be used in combination with symbol to specify the currency.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of derivative series information.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary:
Returns news for the specified selection
Only the first 250 news messages for the selection in the news history are available.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description:
Optional start date, if left out, fromdate will be today. If no instrument ids are supplied, only dates from the
last month are accepted, otherwise only dates from the last week are accepted.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Optional end date, do not combine with instruments.

parameters.name: instrumentIds
parameters.description:
Optional ids of the instruments to retrieve.
If there are multiple ids, separate them by comma's.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of the news messages.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets all active/recent orders of an account
get.description: The response contains the active, cancelled and recent orders. If there is no order, the collection will be empty.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: 'all' will select all the orders. Other possible values are 'open', 'executed' and 'canceled'.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of the orders.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

post.summary: Register an order to sent to the market
post.description: This order will be sent to the market and executed according to the specifications. Something to be aware of: the response of this call might arrive after the order event from the realtime feed.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number to register the order.

parameters.name: newOrder
parameters.description: Specifications to be used for the order.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

422.description: [Unprocessable Entity] The request is valid but the order can not be validated. See response body for more detail.

get.summary: Gets all the historical orders of an account
get.description: The response contains the historical orders of the requested month. If there is no order, the collection will be empty.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for which the historical orders should be retrieved

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: The month for which the historical orders should be retrieved

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of the orders.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets a specific order for an account
get.description: If the order has multiple legs, multiple order objects are returned.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number used to register the order.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The order number for this account.

200.description: [OK] The order is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

delete.description: Cancellation is possible only if the order has not already been executed (order.lastStatus is “placed”, “placementConfirmed”, or “modified”).

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number used to register the order.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The order number for this account.

200.description: [OK] The cancellation request is successfully created.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

422.description: [Unprocessable Entity] The request is valid but the order can not be validated. See response body for more detail.

patch.description: First, validate the modification - modification is possible if the order has not already been executed (order.lastStatus is “placementConfirmed”, or “modified”).

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The order number.

parameters.name: modifiedOrder
parameters.description: Modifications to be used for the order.

200.description: OK

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

post.summary: Validates the modification of an already existing order
post.description:
This allows you to validate an order modification without sending it to the market. The order will not be created.
The response will contain information about if the order can be processed.
It also might includes warnings to show to the customer. And Confirmations, which are warnings to be approved by the customer, before placing the order modification.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The order number.

parameters.name: modifiedOrder
parameters.description: Modifications to be used for the order.

200.description: OK

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

post.description:
This allows you to validate an order without sending it to the market. The order will not be created. The response will contain information about if the order can be processed.
It also includes warnings to show to the customer. And Confirmations, which are warnings to be approved by the customer, before placing the order.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number to register the order.

parameters.name: newOrder
parameters.description: Specifications to be used for the order.

200.description: [OK] The preview is successful. For more information about the order, check the response.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

post.summary: Previews the costs for an order
post.description: This allows you to check costs for an order without sending it to the market.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number to register the order.

parameters.name: newOrder
parameters.description: Specifications to be used for the order.

200.description: [OK] The order cost request is successful. For more information about the costs, check the response.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

422.description: [Unprocessable Entity] The request is valid but the order can not be validated. See response body for more detail.

get.summary: Gets the financial performance information for an account.
get.description: Yearly performance.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

200.description: [OK] The performance information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the financial performance information for an account, per year.
get.description: Only applicable for the years the account was active.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The year for the performance information.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

parameters.name: onPosition
parameters.description:
Performances can be calculated on position level or on instrument level. When 'onPosition' set to true,
the performance of all individual instruments will be reported. If set to false, the performance of 
derivative instruments is included in the performance of the underlying instrument.

200.description: [OK] The performance information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets all the positions of an account
get.description: If there is no position, the collection will be empty.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] A list of the positions.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the specific position for an account
get.description: Positions are identified by the instrument.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number.

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The id of the requested instrument.

200.description: [OK] The position is successfully retrieved.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

get.summary: Returns current quotes and quote subscription (realtime/delayed) for one or more instruments

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: instrumentIds
parameters.description: Ids of the instruments to retrieve. If there are multiple ids, separate them by comma's.

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: The maximal quote level returned

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

200.description: [OK] The quote information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Returns historical quotes for one instrument over a period
get.description: The different intervals each have different maximum period lengths, ranging from five days for one minute, to 10 years for one week.

parameters.name: instrumentId
parameters.description: The Id of the instrument for which the historical quotes will be retrieved

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: Mandatory Account Number

parameters.name: fromDateTime
parameters.description: The start moment of historical quotes

parameters.name: toDateTime
parameters.description: The end moment of historical quotes, defaulting to the Current date and time according to UTC time standard

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
Interval for historical quotes
Depending on the interval, the historical quotes collection returned will be limited to a certain period:
Max. number of days for one minute interval is 5.
Max. number of days for five minute interval is 20.
Max. number of days for ten minute interval is 20.
Max. number of days for fifteen minute interval is 60.
Max. number of days for one hour interval is 120.
Max. number of years for one day interval is 10.
Max. number of years for one week interval is 10.

200.description: [OK] The historical quote information is successfully retrieved.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

404.description: [NotFound] The account or instrument is not found.

get.summary: Gets the current active sessions
get.description: Only internal use.

200.description: [OK] The sessions are returned.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

delete.description: Sessions must be closed, because there is a limit on the active sessions.

200.description: [OK] The session is ended.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Obtains the product settings for the specified account
get.description: If the settings return an empty list, trading is not allowed. This can be the case for a savings account, or if the account is not fully activated yet.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: The account number.

200.description: [OK] A list of the settings.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets all the transactions for an account
get.description: The response not only includes the executed orders, but also withdrawals and deposits.

parameters.name: accountNumber
parameters.description: An account number

parameters.name: range
parameters.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Date from which to filter. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Date to which to filter. Format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: mutationGroup
parameters.description:
Mutation groups (with enums)
BuyAndSell includes :
AssignmentCall
AssignmentPut
ExcerciseCall
ExcercisePut
Buy
OpeningBuy
OpeningBuyFutures
Sell
OpeningSell
OpeningSellFutures
ClosingBuy
ClosingBuyFutures
ClosingSell
ClosingSellFutures
Cost includes :
SettlementCosts
CouponPayment includes :
SecuritiesLendingCouponPayment
CouponPayment
DividendPayment includes :
SecuritiesLendingDividendPayment
DividendPayment
InterestPayment includes :
CreditInterest
DebitInterest
MoneyTransfer includes :
ExternalTransfer
InternalTransfer
OnlineMoneyTransfer
Regulation
PositionMutation includes :
Buy
Sell

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: 3-letter currency code (ISO 4217)

200.description: [OK] A list of the transactions.

400.description: [Bad Request] The request is not valid. See response body for more detail.

401.description: [Unauthorized] Authorization has been denied for this request.

get.summary: Gets the current version and the last date of build.

200.description: OK

accountsCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more accounts

AccountsCollectionModel.description: Collection of zero, one or more accounts

accounts.description: Collection of zero, one or more accounts

timestamp.description: Date and time the response is created

developerMessage.description: The message that should be used by the developer

endUserMessage.description: The message that can be shown to the end user

balancesCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more balances

BalancesCollectionModel.description: Collection of zero, one or more balances

balances.description: Collection of zero, one or more balances

cashBalancesCollection.description: Collection of one or more cash accounts per currency

CashBalancesCollectionModel.description: Collection of one or more money accounts - always the cash of the base currency and if available Dollar, and/or other money accounts.

CashBalanceModel.description: Cash balance containing the balance for the Euro account, and if available, other cash balances

AccountNumberQueryParam.description: Parameters class to validate query parameters.

range.description:
Paging parameter to retrieve a subset of the complete collection. Format is <offset>-<limit>. 
Both values are an offset from the first entry of the complete collection. The first entry has offset '0'.
(e.g. 12-21)

instrumentsCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more instruments

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

PagingModel.description: Paging model for offset base pagination

limit.description: Offset of the last entry in this subset

max.description: Maximum number of entries per subset

offset.description: Offset of the first entry in this subset

next.description: Parameter and value to add to the request to retrieve the next subset

previous.description: Parameter and value to add to the request to retrieve the previous subset

refresh.description: Parameter and value to add to the request to retrieve the same subset

marketIdentificationCode.description: Market Identification Code of the instrument

srdInfo.description:
Srd or Srd class information:
Searching for an Srd will return a class. Ordering can done on both this class or the underlying equity.
Positions and transactions report the SRD class. To get information about the underlying equity, the SRD can be retrieved using the instruments endpoint.

priceDecimals.description: Number of decimals used to format the price

isTradable.description: Indicates if orders for this instrument can be processed

isKidApplicable.description: Indicates whether KID document must be shown before placing an order

tickSizeCollection.description: Table containing tick sizes for minimal prize movement

hasOptions.description:
Indicates whether there exists at least one non-cancelled, non-expired, tradable option for this security, either
an underlying value or an option class, with a valid listing (for the company/label) for which
the account is allowed to trade

hasFutures.description:
Indicates whether there exists at least one non-cancelled, non-expired, tradable future for this instrument
, either an underlying value or a future class, with a valid listing (for the company/label) for which the account
is allowed to trade.

hasSrd.description:
Indicates whether there exists at least one non-cancelled, non-expired, tradable srd for this security, either an
underlying value or an srd class, with a valid listing (for the company/label) for which the account
is allowed to trade.

hasLeveragedProducts.description:
Indicates whether there exists at least one non-cancelled, non-expired, tradable, visible leveraged
product for which the account is allowed to trade.

hasOrderModifications.description: Indicates if orders for the instrument can be modified

strikeDecimals.description: Maximum number of decimals in strike price

TickSizesModel.description: Collection of TickSize steps used in the Instrument Model

TickSizeStepModel.description:
A tick size is the minimum price movement of a trading instrument.
The price movements of different trading instruments vary, with their tick sizes representing the minimum amount they can move up or down on an exchange.
Table might consist of only one row.

instrumentType.description: Additional optional filter on instrument type. Cannot be used alone.

searchText.description: Case insensitive search text, minimum length 2. Cannot be used in combination with 'Isin'.

isin.description: Selection on isincode. Cannot be used in combination with 'SearchText'.

mic.description: Additional optional selection on Market Identification Code, to be used only in combination with 'Isin'

publisher.description: Name of the publishing company, default is 'binckBank'

longShort.description: Long or short, default is 'all' (both long and short)

type.description: Specifies type (Turbo or XL), default is 'all' (both Turbo and XL)

kids.description: Holds KID collection data in name, KID id pair

symbol.description:
Selection on symbol. 
Cannot be used in combination with 'UnderlyingInstrumentId'.

underlyingInstrumentId.description:
Selection on the ID of the underlying equity.
Cannot be used in combination with 'symbol'.

marketIdentificationCode.description: Can be used in combination with symbol to specify the market.

currency.description: Can be used in combination with symbol to specify the currency.

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

DerivativeClassInfoModel.description: The model for derivatives - future ans option classes

type.description: Type of the class (option or future class)

series.description: Collection of series for this class

strikeDecimals.description: Number of decimals in strike price (options only)

NewsRequestQueryParams.description: Query params for the news message

fromDate.description:
Optional start date, if left out, fromdate will be today. If no instrument ids are supplied, only dates from the
last month are accepted, otherwise only dates from the last week are accepted.

toDate.description: Optional end date, do not combine with instruments.

instrumentIds.description:
Optional ids of the instruments to retrieve.
If there are multiple ids, separate them by comma's.

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

subscriptions.description: List of subscriptions for the specified account

format.description: Indication whether the body is in HTML format

publishedDateTime.description: Date and time the publisher published the message

instrumentIds.description: The instruments for which this news message contains news (if any)

status.description: 'all' will select all the orders. Other possible values are 'open', 'executed' and 'canceled'.

ordersCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more orders

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

instrument.description: Attributes of the financial instrument ordered

type.description: The price type of the order

duration.description: Specifies the term for which the order is in effect

line.description: Line number of this order in case of a multi line order

executedQuantity.description: Number of executed instruments (equities), nominal value (odds) or number of contracts (options and futures)

averagePrice.description: Average price of all fills on this order

expirationDate.description: Expiration date and time for a good till date order

lastStatus.description: Status of the order last executed

stopPrice.description: Stop price for a stop or stop limit order

rejectionReason.description: The reason of rejection in case of a rejected order

rejectionReasonDetail.description: Detail explanation of the reason for rejection of the order

condition.description: Pay or receive condition, only applicable for multi-leg orders

referenceId.description: Reference Id supplied at registration time

executionPrice.description: Execution price of the executed quantities

type.description: The kind of order to be placed

quantity.description: The number of financial instruments to buy or sell

duration.description: Specifies the term for which the order is active

expirationDate.description: The date when the order will be expired, used in combination with duration GoodTillDateTime

limitPrice.description: The highest price at which to buy or the lowest price at which to sell (only if type is limit or stopLimit)

stopPrice.description: The trigger price to initiate a buy or sell order, applicable when type is stop or stopLimit

cash.description: For cash orders (equities), this field is required

srd.description: For SRD orders (equities, France), this field is required

option.description: For option orders, this field is required

future.description: For future orders, this field is required

validationCode.description: Order validation code (needs to be obtained by a preview order)

referenceId.description: Reference identifier available for 3rd parties. Max length 40 chars

NewOrderModelCash.description: For cash orders (equities), this field is required

NewOrderModelSrd.description: For SRD orders (equities), this field is required

instrumentId.description: The instrumentId of a SRD class, or the underlying equity

NewOrderModelOption.description: For option orders, this field is required

leg1.description: The information about the first leg

leg2.description: For a strategy the second leg is required

NewOrderModelFuture.description: For future orders (equities), this field is required

ordersCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more orders

year.description: The year for which the historical orders should be retrieved

month.description: The month for which the historical orders should be retrieved

limitPrice.description: New Limit Price of the Order.

validationCode.description: Order validation code (needs to be obtained by a preview modify order)

previewOrder.description: Information related to the order validation such as if the order is processable, spending power, etc.

PreviewOrderModel.description: This object is used in the response of the order validation call.

orderCanBeRegistered.description: True if the order can be placed

expectedExpirationDate.description: For GTD en GTC orders the end date will be limited to about 2 weeks maximum

positionEffect.description: Contains the position effect information (open, close)

effectOnSpendingLimit.description: Effect of a successfully placed order on the spending limit of the account

currentSpendingLimit.description: The current spending limit of the account (before placing the order)

newSpendingLimit.description: The new spending limit of the account (after placing the order)

currency.description: The currency of the spending limit

oldRiskNumber.description: Risk number before placing the order

newRiskNumber.description: Risk number after successfully placing the order

warningsToBeShown.description: Warnings or error messages about the requested order that only needs to be shown

warningsToBeConfirmed.description: Warning messages about the requested order that explicitly need to be confirmed

validationCode.description: (Optional) validation code (only supplied when order can be registered)

legs.description: Order execution costs per order leg

OrderCostsForLegModel.description: Collection of order costs for one leg of the order

name.description: Order category name, translated in the language of the customer

percentage.description: Percentage representation of the cost category

valueInEuro.description: Amount in EUR of costs for the category

extraInfo.description: In case of null values for ValueInEuros / percentage, ExtraInfo will be be provided

name.description: Order category name, translated in the language of the customer

percentage.description: Percentage representation of the cost category

valueInEuro.description: Amount in EUR of costs for the category

extraInfo.description: In case of null values for ValueInEuros / percentage, ExtraInfo will be be provided

performancesCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more performances for positions

PerformanceCollectionModel.description: Collection of zero, one or more performances for positions

performances.description: Collection of zero, one or more performances for positions

PerformanceSummaryModel.description: Summary for a year or a total summary (in case of year results requested)

PerformanceDetailModel.description: Performance for one instrument. Due to rounding errors some calculation have difference of one cent.

year.description: Year in case of summary info

onPosition.description:
Performances can be calculated on position level or on instrument level. When 'onPosition' set to true,
the performance of all individual instruments will be reported. If set to false, the performance of 
derivative instruments is included in the performance of the underlying instrument.

positionsCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more positions

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

quantity.description: Number of securities or contracts or nominal value

accruedInterest.description: Accrued interest in case of a debt instrument

averageHistoricalPrice.description: Volume weighted average price paid at the time of purchase

valueInEuro.description: Value of the position expressed in the EURO currency

result.description: Result expressed in mentioned currency of instrument

resultInEuro.description: Result expressed in the EURO currency

currency.description: Currency the result is expressed in

unrealizedPercentage.description: Unrealized result in a percentage of ... (?)

instrumentIds.description: Ids of the instruments to retrieve. If there are multiple ids, separate them by comma's.

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

priceDateTime.description: Date and time of the quote according to the exchange (local to the market)

tags.description: Tags for Market (M), Cancel (O), MarketOpen (O), ExcludeIntraday (X)

PriceWithVolumeModel.description: Model of a quote with volume

priceDateTime.description: Date and time of the quote according to the exchange (local to the market)

tags.description: Tags for Market (M), Cancel (O), MarketOpen (O), ExcludeIntraday (X)
Tags for Market (M), Cancel (O), MarketOpen (O), ExcludeIntraday (X)

orderCount.description: Number of open orders for this price

priceDateTime.description: Date and time of the quote according to the exchange (local to the market)

tags.description: Tags for Market (M), Cancel (O), MarketOpen (O), ExcludeIntraday (X)

fromDateTime.description: The start moment of historical quotes

toDateTime.description: The end moment of historical quotes, defaulting to the Current date and time according to UTC time standard

interval.description:
Interval for historical quotes
Depending on the interval, the historical quotes collection returned will be limited to a certain period:
Max. number of days for one minute interval is 5.
Max. number of days for five minute interval is 20.
Max. number of days for ten minute interval is 20.
Max. number of days for fifteen minute interval is 60.
Max. number of days for one hour interval is 120.
Max. number of years for one day interval is 10.
Max. number of years for one week interval is 10.

dateTime.description: Date and time of the quote according to the exchange (local to the market)

last.description: Latest trade price at the end of the interval

first.description: First trade price within the interval

cumVol.description: Sum of all volumes within the interval

message.description: A message confirming the sign out is complete

SessionsCollectionModel.description: Collection of zero, one or more sessions

SessionModel.description: Session information used by internal applications to replace the login and retrieve the session id for the default account

SettingsCollectionModel.description: A collection of settings model instances

tradingAllowed.description: A list of products trading is allowed for

fromDate.description: Date from which to filter. Format YYYY-MM-DD

toDate.description: Date to which to filter. Format YYYY-MM-DD

mutationGroup.description:
Mutation groups (with enums)
BuyAndSell includes :
AssignmentCall
AssignmentPut
ExcerciseCall
ExcercisePut
Buy
OpeningBuy
OpeningBuyFutures
Sell
OpeningSell
OpeningSellFutures
ClosingBuy
ClosingBuyFutures
ClosingSell
ClosingSellFutures
Cost includes :
SettlementCosts
CouponPayment includes :
SecuritiesLendingCouponPayment
CouponPayment
DividendPayment includes :
SecuritiesLendingDividendPayment
DividendPayment
InterestPayment includes :
CreditInterest
DebitInterest
MoneyTransfer includes :
ExternalTransfer
InternalTransfer
OnlineMoneyTransfer
Regulation
PositionMutation includes :
Buy
Sell

transactionsCollection.description: Collection of zero, one or more Transactions

count.description: Number of entries in the complete collection

TransactionsCollectionModel.description: The model for the transactions endpoint

number.description: State the uniqueness of this number for an account

transactionDate.description: The transaction date is the date when the transaction is effective

settlementDate.description: The date on which the transfer between two parties is executed

mutationType.description: Enumerated value of the mutation type

balanceMutation.description: Total amount when the transaction is completed

mutatedBalance.description: Total amount when the transaction is completed

quantity.description: The number of financial instruments to buy or sell

exchange.description: Name of the exchange where this instrument was handled

currency.description: Transaction currency. This currency was used to complete this transaction

netAmount.description: The total amount for this transaction without the costs

currencyRate.description: The exchange rate used for the transaction currency

transactionCostComponents.description: All Cost components for this transactions

scopes.read: Read access to account(s) with portfolio.
